Content: Several private bus workers have refrained from work pledging their support to the strike launched by workers along the route number 125 (Padukka- Pettah) after a driver was assaulted. According to the President of Padukka Private Bus Ownersâ€™ Association Thushan Peiris, bus workers in Bope- Maharagama, Meepe- Padukka, Waga- Padukka have refrained from work. A group backed by a depo worker in Homagama has assaulted the bus driver, but no arrests were made thus far.
